item.title: common errors in NPM or node
item.description: code E503 code E503 when run npm install packages, e.g. npm install pretty-data Get following error: ` npm ERR! code E503 npm ERR! 503 Service Unavailable: pretty-data@latest npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in: npm ERR! xxxx\nodejs\npm-cache_logs\2017-12-07T04_16_53_679Z-debug.log Solution: You maybe behind corporate proxy, so try execute following command npm config set proxy http://127.0.0.1:53128
